intro: Fuirena leptostachya f. leptostachya, commonly known as the narrow-stemmed fuirena, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Polygonaceae. It is characterized by its slender, upright stems and small, clustered greenish-white flowers. The leaves are typically lance-shaped and have a smooth or slightly hairy surface. This plant is native to parts of Asia and thrives in moist, shady environments. It is often found in forests and along stream banks where it contributes to the understory vegetation.
